text: Local body elections were held in the Indian state of Uttarakhand on 8 July 2019. The Uttarakhand State Election Commission announced the poll dates for Srinagar and Bajpur Municipal elections on 14 June 2019 and the results were declared on 10 July 2019. Uttarakhand State Election Commission announced the poll date for Roorkee Municipal Corporation on 22 November 2019 and results were declared on 24 November 2019.https://www.amarujala.com/dehradun/roorkee- nikay-chunav-notification-issued-election-on-22nd-november?src=top-lead ==Timeline== {| class="wikitable" !Event !Date !Day |- | Date for Nominations || 18 June 2019 || Tuesday |- | Last Date for filing Nominations || 19 June 2019 || Wednesday |- | Date for scrutiny of nominations || 20 June 2019 || Thursday |- | Last date for withdrawal of candidatures || 21 June 2019 || Friday |- | Allotment of Symbols || 22 June 2019 || Saturday |- | Date of poll || 8 July 2019 || Monday |- | Date of counting || 10 July 2019 || Wednesday |} ==Results== === Municipal Corporation Mayoral results=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Municipal Corporation Mayoral results |- style="text- align:center; height:45px;" ! scope="col" | S.
